body_html:
Hi @milinddeore,
The first iteration may take time to determine min and max of quantized ops. There are several ways to check whether your app is properly calling HVX functions. The easiest way is

  HexagonControlWrapper hexagon_control_wrapper;
  const int version = hexagon_control_wrapper.GetVersion();

If this GetVersion returns 1 or larger value, you can properly calling hvx code. Let me know if it doesn't solve your problem.
body:
Hi @milinddeore,
The first iteration may take time to determine min and max of quantized ops.  There are several ways to check whether your app is properly calling HVX functions.  The easiest way is 
```
  HexagonControlWrapper hexagon_control_wrapper;
  const int version = hexagon_control_wrapper.GetVersion();
```
If this GetVersion returns 1 or larger value, you can properly calling hvx code.  Let me know if it doesn't solve your problem.
